tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SoilHealthIndex ( 
   id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
   pH FLOAT, 
   organic_matter FLOAT, 
   nitrogen FLOAT, 
   phosphorus FLOAT, 
   potassium FLOAT, 
   calcium FLOAT, 
   magnesium FLOAT 
);

CREATE TABLE soil_health_index (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    parameter1 FLOAT NOT NULL,
    parameter2 FLOAT NOT NULL,
    parameter3 FLOAT NOT NULL,
    parameter4 FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE crop_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    soil_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    crop_yield FLOAT NOT NULL,
    planting_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    temperature FLOAT NOT NULL,
    humidity FLOAT NOT NULL,
    precipitation FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE SoilSamples (
  sample_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  date_collected DATE,
  ph_level FLOAT,
  moisture_level FLOAT,
  nutrient_level FLOAT
);
